SEARCH
Package wahoot.db

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
wahoot.db.Manager
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<Object>
public class Manager extends Object implements DAO<Object>
Class keeps track of all DAO instances and proxy's CRUD operations to the DAO matching the respective entity
